CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ambow Education Holding Ltd. is engaged in providing educational software and hardware systems that enables hybrid online and offline learning. The Companys HybriU platform is a cloud-based learning engine allows colleges and universities to accommodate their students individual learning preferences. Its HybriU platform also enables institutions to provide online classes, instant artificial intelligence (AI) translation, and simultaneous content creation. The Company offers career-oriented post-secondary educational services to undergraduates through the New School of Architecture & Design in San Diego. Its HybriU covers large, top-tier United States universities, as well as smaller, regional colleges that offer career-oriented programs in fields such as healthcare and software coding.

value.name: Jin Huang
value.title: Chairman, President, Chief Executive Officer & CFO
